['c-review__body', 'c-review__body--original']: 駅近
スパがある

['c-review__body', 'c-review__body--translated', 'positive', 'c-review__body--hidden']: There is a spa menu where you can soak in a radon hot spring for 20 minutes with a wonderful view from the room with a spa near the station, and it has a wonderful effect.


['bui-u-sr-only']: Disliked


['c-review__body', 'c-review__body--original']: 部屋の斜め真下のバー「Silver Bullet Bar」で若者が大騒ぎ。明け方まで気狂いのようにうるさく、我々の部屋の位置は最悪でした。
でもこれはホテルのせいではありません
スパの中は人が大勢で騒ぐ子供や、塩素臭がしてプールに入る気にはなれませんでした
又　夜の食事はパッケージでつけた方が良い
近くに食事に行く気が失せる寒さと坂があります


['c-review__body', 'c-review__body--translated', 'negative', 'c-review__body--hidden']: Young people make a fuss at the bar "Silver Bullet Bar" diagonally below the room. It was maddeningly loud until dawn and our room was in the worst possible location. But this is not the hotel's fault. The spa was crowded with children and the smell of chlorine made me not want to go in the pool. There are cold and slopes that make you lose the will to go
